SCAN's Classroom in the Community presentations focused on senior health and wellness can now be found at community centers and senior centers throughout Maricopa and Pima counties. As a leading community resource for seniors, SCAN strives to bring together other partners in health to help Medicare beneficiaries access the other low- and no-cost resources available to them. It is pressure, because if the wrong person wins, I'm in trouble.... We've got to find somebody fantastic to get the money back through record sales.
